scripts.dev: (killall -9 node || echo 'Process was not running.') && reveal-md . -w --theme ../assets/theme/qt-dark.css --listing-template listing.html --scripts ../assets/js/script.js
scripts.pdf: (killall -9 node || echo 'Process was not running.') && for i in *.md; do [ -f '$i' ] || break && reveal-md '$i' --theme ../assets/theme/qt-dark.css --listing-template listing.html --scripts ../assets/js/script.js --print 'pdf/$i.pdf'; done;
